title: Linus Nirmal Gomes
text:
Linus Nirmal Gomes, <a href="Society%20of%20Jesus">S.J.</a> (7 September 1921 – 27 February 2021) was an Indian Roman Catholic prelate, who served as the first bishop of the newly established diocese of Baruipur since 1977. He retired in 1995.
Gomes was born in Boro Golla (India), joined the <a href="Society%20of%20Jesus">Society of Jesus</a> on 26 June 1942, and was ordained a <a href="Catholic%20priest">priest</a> on 21 November 1954. Gomes was appointed bishop to the <a href="Roman%20Catholic%20Diocese%20of%20Baruipur">Diocese of Baruipur</a> on 30 May 1977 and ordained bishop on 19 November 1977. Gomes retired on 31 October 1995 as bishop of the Baruipur Diocese. He died in February 2021 at the age of 99.
